summary: Taking place almost entirely over the course of one stormy night, a woman is terrified when an accused murderer escapes from a mental hospital and seeks refuge in her home.
cast: Rajesh Khanna|Nanda|Sujit Kumar|Bindu|Madan Puri|Gajanan Jagirdar|Iftekhar|Shammi|Jagdish Raj|Lala Nazir|Amrit|Alka
title: Ittefaq
